channel.title: Env definition as object
channel.description:
Continuation of [Configuring Services with Deploy-Time or Run-Time Arguments](https://forum.mesg.com/t/configuring-services-with-deploy-time-or-run-time-arguments/124/9)
- [ ] env in mesg.yml are a array of string. It could be good to also accept an array of object
Something like:
```yaml configuration: env: - key: AN_ENV_VAR_FOR_SERVICE name: "Set the endpoint of blablabla...." // user friendly name. Optional value: 123 // Developer defined value, eg: default value. dependencies: depA: env: - key: AN_OTHER_ENV_VAR_FOR_DEP_A name: "Set the endpoint of blablabla...." // user friendly name. Optional value: 123 // Developer defined value, eg: default value. ```

item.title: Env definition as object
item.dc:creator: Nicolas
item.description:
Continuation of Configuring Services with Deploy-Time or Run-Time Arguments

  • env in mesg.yml are a array of string. It could be good to also accept an array of object

Something like:

configuration:
  env:
    - key: AN_ENV_VAR_FOR_SERVICE
      name: "Set the endpoint of blablabla...." // user friendly name. Optional
      value: 123 // Developer defined value, eg: default value.
dependencies:
  depA:
    env:
      - key: AN_OTHER_ENV_VAR_FOR_DEP_A
        name: "Set the endpoint of blablabla...." // user friendly name. Optional
        value: 123 // Developer defined value, eg: default value.
